title.rendered: Top 9 Software Development Companies In India

content.rendered:
Nowadays, everything we use in our day-to-day lives has a connection with computers or the software, developed by software outsourcing companies. The software programs available in the market not only help in boosting the growth of the businesses but also streamlines the various processes and offer improved communication between B2B & B2C.

Based on the IBEF study, the IT sector has generated nearly $191.0 billion in early 2020 and expected to reach $350.0 billion by 2025 with a surging CAGR of 7.7%.

According to NASSCOM, India is the leading outsourcing destination around the world, holding around 55.0% market share in the global outsourcing market worth $200-250 billion in 2019-20. Across the globe, India has also become the digital capabilities hub with nearly 75.0% of digital talent present in the country. 

Thus, India is a well-known name in the ground of top software companies and widely outsourced by the majority of startups and enterprises from across the globe for software development.

But are all software development companies in India worth considering?

Well, the answer is no.

And to help with that, today, in this blog, I am going to shortlist the top 9 software outsourcing companies in India which you can consider for your project.

So, I have shortlisted the top 9 software development companies based on the following factors- 

  • Rated by Clutch and Good firms. 
  • Years of Experience 
  • Number of employees
  • Number of Projects delivered 
  • Number of clients’ detail 
  • Partnered with Big Brands 

Let’s start! 

Top 9 Software Development Companies in India

1) WIPRO

Img Souce

In February 2002 Wipro achieved ISO 9000 certification to be the first software company and since then it has won the hearts of millions of people across the globe. It is a leading global information consulting, technology, and business process service company. 

The company harness the power of hyper-automation, cognitive computing, cloud, robotics, analytics, and the latest technologies to support the clients to adapt to the digital world. From developing more adaptive “business-anywhere” frameworks to the emerging technologies that boost the intelligent enterprise. 

  • 18+ years of experience
  • Over 160,000 employees 
  • Clients in more than 110 countries
  • 1200+ active clients 

The company has partnered with big brands, including IBM, AWS, Adobe, Citrix, Google, Huawei, and Hitachi. Wipro is boosting a more silent future for communities and customers, but quite over the budget for a startup.

2) VALUECODERS

Image Source

Well, not every founder birth with the sliver spoon some have to struggle and earn the name like ValueCoders. ValueCoders is a leading software outsourcing company in India that offers an on-demand software team facility. The company was incorporated in 2014 with a handful of people and now has a family of 450+ employees. 

The company has a track record of delivering services to startups, digital agencies, enterprises, and software product development companies in India at an affordable price. The company is specialized in IT consulting, mobile app development, and eCommerce website development. 

  • 18+ years of experience 
  • More than 450 employees 
  • 2500+ happy customer
  • 4200+ projects in 31+ countries 
  • 97.0% client retention 

The company is recognized by NASSCOM, Deloitte, and ISO 9001 as one of the top software companies and has a 5.0 rating from Clutch and GoodFirms. So far, the company has worked with Dubai Police, UNESCO, Capgemini, Thomas Reuters, and TEKION. 

Here are some snapshots of ValueCoders’ Case Studies

3) VOFOX SOLUTIONS

Img Src: Google Search

Vofox solution was incorporated in 2005 and witnessed as an emerging software outsourcing development companies in India. The company has been delivering scalable, high-quality, and cost-effective offshore software solutions. As a top-notch software development company, it develops, strategizes, and executes solutions into the client’s project efficiently. 

The company develop and design software solutions and share expert knowledge to add value to their client’s business. Rent a coder from the pool of their professionals at an affordable cost.   

  • 14+ years of experience 
  • More than 130 employees
  • 500+  satisfied clients 
  • 100+ projects 

The company is specialized in software outsourcing services, IT consulting, QA/Testing services, content management, and frontend development. The company has 5.0+ ratings given by GoodFirms. The company has a good track record of working with renowned clients across the globe. 

Here is the screenshot of some testimonial of Vofox Solutions Pvt Ltd-

4) CAPITAL NUMBER

CapitalNumbers was established in 2012 and has gained immense popularity in this short span of time. It is certified by ISO 9001 and ISO 27001 as a top-rated digital solutions company. The company has an innovative “In-Demand Skills” / On-Demand Skills” that allows businesses to reform their team for Mobile, Web, and DevOps needs. 

The company is a leading global provider of mobile app development and web application development services. It helps digital agencies, brands, start-ups, and entrepreneurs to expand their business globally. 

  • 8+ years of experience 
  • 400+ employees 
  • 1500+ delivered projects 
  • 237+ satisfied clients 

The company offers various services, including SaaS applications, Online retail, digital publishing, and financial. It has 5.0+ ratings from Good Firms and Clutch and has been recognized by Deloitte. The company has worked with Silicon Valley, CONDE NAST, Thomson Reuters, HUDSON Regional Hospital. 

Here is the list of some best CapitalNumbers case studies- 

5) ALLIANCETEK

AllianceTek transform your business with its user-centric and agile software development approach. The company was incorporated in 2006 and has completed hundreds of projects to date. The company provides a technology bridge to the start-ups and enterprises to offer prosperity in their businesses. 

As a world-class software outsourcing company, it helps businesses to achieve their goals and implement strategies that are customized, unique, and advanced. They provide industry-specific services that align processes, people, and systems to add value to the business. 

  • 14+ years of experience 
  • 480+ successful projects 
  • 12+ global locations 
  • 87+ employees 

The company has 5.0+ ratings from GoodFirms and Clutch and is recognized by Deloitte ISO, as a top software development company in India. The company has worked with Microsoft silver partner, salesforce, and KWIZCom. 

Here is the snapshot of AllianceTek case study:

6) VELOTIO

Img Src: Google

Velotio was established in 2016 and known as a top-notch software outsourcing company in India. The company has an offshore agile development team that works with full caliber to deliver the project on-time. Businesses can hire developers to fulfill the technological gaps and provide a better experience to their clients. 

The company is helping start-ups, engineering leaders, enterprises, and entrepreneurs build exceptionally high-performing offshore teams. Apart from consulting service, it offers to rent a coder facility too to those who have a budget constraint. 

  • 4+ years of experience 
  • 80.0% YoY growth 
  • 125+ employees 
  • 90+ happy clients 
  • 70.0% client retention 

Clutch and GoodFirms have given Velotio 4.0+ ratings.  The company has partnered with COMCATE and BlueDot for software outsourcing services. 

Here is the screenshot of Velotio top-most case studies- 

7) TALENTICA

Img Src: Google

Talentica was introduced in 2003 and has a track record of developing more than hundreds of technology products for startups, entrepreneurs, and enterprises. It helps businesses deploy the latest technologies, leverage emerging tools, and set up the right architecture into their solutions. 

It is an innovative outsourced product development firm that supports small businesses and startups to build unique products. The top software companies empower businesses to transform their ideas into successful solutions. 

  • 17+ years of experience 
  • 250+ employees 
  • 140+ projects 
  • 80.0% client retention 

The company has gained 4.0 ratings from Clutch and GoodFirms. The company has worked with big brands such as Opera, TALA, Citrus, and Limetray. It is recognized by Deloitte, Red Herring Asia, and Microsoft Partner. 

Here is the snapshot of Talentica top-most case studies- 

8) NET SOLUTIONS

Img Src: Google

Net Solutions has 12+ years of experience in delivering world-class software outsourcing services to thousands of people. The company follows an agile approach and end-to-end process to deliver customized solutions. 

The company offers highly advanced and tailor-made solutions that maximize efficiencies, delight users, and boost revenue. It has a proven record of helping start-ups and enterprises optimize their online businesses for massive growth. 

  • 12+ years of experience
  • 275+ employees 
  • 500+ projects 
  • 110+ clients 

The company has a strategic design and unique consultancy facility that combines creative design thinking with the agile development approach under one expert roof. The company has worked with big organizations, such as Microsoft AWS, and Paypal. It is recognized by Clutch, Good Firms, Gartner, and Adobe as a top software outsourcing company. 

Here is the snapshot of Net Solutions’ case studies-

9) RUSHKAR

Rushkar was incorporated in 2010, an Indian software outsourcing company that aims at offering highly qualitative, cost-effective, and timely delivered software solutions. It helps businesses harness the power of technology advances and developments. 

The company with its innovative delivery frameworks provides enterprises, start-ups a way to create business value by outsourcing excellent business IT solutions. 

  • 8+ years of experience
  • 250+ successful project 
  • 50+ talented employees 
  • 220+ satisfied clients 

The company has 4.0 ratings from GoodFirms and Clutch. It is recognized among the top software companies in India.  

Here is the snapshot of Rushkar famous case studies- 

Why Hire a Software Outsourcing Company from India?  

Following are some of the reasons why outsourcing a software development company from India – 

  • Enormous talent pool 
  • No communication barrier 
  • Lower operational costs 
  • Time zone benefits 
  • Superior quality 
  • Extensive expertise 
  • Real-time project access
  • End-to-end service 
  • Latest Technology Integration 

Conclusion

Well, deciding which company to outsource for your next software is no doubt though. But there are many companies, such as ValueCoders or Wipro who are 24*7 available, affordable, and are just one call away. So, if you are looking to rent a coder or want to outsource a software development company then considering the above list would be the right choice.
